database.name: VIEW ESCM_BENEFICIARY_V
database.view: SELECT dep.ad_org_id AS escm_beneficiary_v_id, dep.value, (dep.value || '-') || dep.name AS name, dep.ad_client_id, dep.ad_org_id, dep.isactive, dep.created, dep.createdby, dep.updated, dep.updatedby, 'D' AS btype FROM ad_org dep WHERE dep.em_ehcm_orgtyp IS NOT NULL AND (dep.em_ehcm_orgtyp IN (SELECT ehcm_org_type.ehcm_org_type_id FROM ehcm_org_type WHERE ehcm_org_type.value NOT IN ('CLIENT', 'ORG'))) UNION SELECT bp.c_bpartner_id AS escm_beneficiary_v_id, bp.value, (bp.value || '-') || bp.name AS name, bp.ad_client_id, bp.ad_org_id, bp.isactive, bp.created, bp.createdby, bp.updated, bp.updatedby, 'E' AS btype FROM c_bpartner bp WHERE bp.isemployee = 'Y' UNION SELECT wh.m_warehouse_id AS escm_beneficiary_v_id, wh.value, (wh.value || '-') || wh.name AS name, wh.ad_client_id, wh.ad_org_id, wh.isactive, wh.created, wh.createdby, wh.updated, wh.updatedby, 'W' AS btype FROM m_warehouse wh UNION SELECT line.escm_deflookups_typeln_id AS escm_beneficiary_v_id, line.value, (line.value || '-') || line.name AS name, line.ad_client_id, line.ad_org_id, line.isactive, line.created, line.createdby, line.updated, line.updatedby, 'S' AS btype FROM escm_deflookups_typeln line WHERE (line.escm_deflookups_type_id IN (SELECT escm_deflookups_type.escm_deflookups_type_id FROM escm_deflookups_type WHERE escm_deflookups_type.reference = 'S' AND escm_deflookups_type.isactive = 'Y'))
